website_summaries.verdict: Once you get past the challenging set up, you will have years of enjoyment with this portable hoop.
pros: A portable model that gets praise for its durability and sporty looks
Holds up nicely in most weather conditions
cons: Difficult to put together – instructions lack detail
Some owners recommend having a helper to assemble it
A bit pricey for a portable hoop

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my new Spalding
customer_reviews.text: TT is spot on with the review. After reading many other reviews and learning about the expected challenges, my experience on the installation was fairly easy. I had a scheduled Saturday 6-9am delivery and actual was about 7:30am. I was able to assemble most of the basketball system by myself. I needed my wife to help me position the backboard while I bolted it to the arms. My son and I were shooting hoops by 11am. I've received many complements from my neighbors on the sturdiness and construction. The hybrid sand/water feature is great! I've learned that lowering the backboard to the lowest height will make it "smaller" so it's easier to move around and to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: MD Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As several other reviews had mentioned, I wish I had taken note, this product arrived with a damaged base. The packaging is woefully inadequate considering the value of what’s inside. Seems like someone has proposed a cost saving that is costing the manufacturer lots of money and reputation. A thin layer of corrugated cardboard is not enough to protect a flimsy piece of plastic with heavy tubular steel packed inside! Due to the long delivery and collection time we decided to replace it locally with an alternative manufacturer which was cheaper, better quality and most of all, not damaged inside the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Have lost two previous hoops due to damage in high winds. This thing held up in very high winds. The combo of water and sand bags is perfect. Backboard gives a true bounce. Not as good as glass, but not flimsy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Overall great basketball hoop!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hoop! Everything about this hoop is great! Delivery was a breeze — we did use amazon for the setup with expert assembly (we got it for $27 somehow) and I’m glad we did! It took the guy about 3 1/2 hours to set up. We bought four 50lbs sand bags but only three bags could fit so we just threw it on top — I’m sure loose sand would fit all 200lbs but we wanted to keep the sand bagged for easy portability! The ball return on this thing is great! If you are a decent shot the ball will roll or bounce right back to you! The entire unit is stable and the height adjustment is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid hoop. Not the best not the worst (photo included)
customer_reviews.text: Look at the photo I uploaded for the biggest issue It was delivered to me just a few days ago and I actually got around to it being built today. Right from the moment it was put up, you can see a noticeable tilt for the backboard to the right side (while facing it) I've tried taking it on and off and adjusting as best as I can but it's there regardless every time. Other than that, it's a solid sturdy hoop. I have it in my backyard and the backboard is awesome also. It's between a 3 and 3.5/5 for me. Overall I would recommend it but hopefully you'll have better luck with the backboard tilt than I did
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: What arrived was not the hoop advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Spalding Hybrid thinking I was getting the pictured item. What arrived was a different hoop of lesser quality with a box in very rough shape. Talk about disappointed and trying to explain it to a 12 year old!! Took a number of days to get the return figured out and questioning if I re-order will the ACTUAL hoop advertised really show up?? This certainly makes me question if this advertisement is trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic + Hybrid base ✔️ Expert assembly ✔️
customer_reviews.text: Love the hybrid setup for this hoop. Ordered the acrylic 54” with the expert assembly. They allow you to pick 3 time slots of 3-hour windows. One person came, called when he was on his way, and was incredibly fast - assembled it in 1.5 hours. So worth the price. Was really hesitant about going acrylic vs glass but couldn’t be happier with the bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great hoop! I spent a lot of time researching portable basketball hoops and reading reviews before finally deciding on this one. It’s a very nice upgrade from the one we’ve had for 14 years. Wasn’t as difficult to put together as a lot of reviews had mentioned. The kids absolutely love it. We never use water in any basketball hoops, only sand and lots of it. Got an awesome deal on this through Amazon. Way cheaper here than Dick’s or Dunham’s. Buy this, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Broken base
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars if I could. Base was broken when the installer opened the box. I've read many reviews about this but didn't think it would happen to me. Son was very disappointed he couldn't play basketball. I returned item and ordered the glass version this time
customer_reviews.author: Freddie G.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I bought advertised product for grandparents house from local sporting good store. Then intended to buy same one for our home. Found exact model on Amazon but received a cheaper flimsy model. Completely different hoop from described.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it and he says it is much better than his friends
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it and he says it is much better than his friends. Would give it 5 starts but..... Be prepared to be a bit frustrated w/ the instructions. I can rebuild a V8 motor but had to reinstall some parts after assuming (wrong) what the instructions were trying to communicate. Make sure and tighten the bolts after using the goal for a few days. It is very difficult to get the sand bags to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: Well, it looks like a good quality unit if we can ever get it put together, but we have parts that aren’t even on the parts list and we are missing a large number of bolts, washers and screws. What a cluster....first time I’ve ever been disappointed by an amazon purchase. I’ll probably be able to get these missing parts at Home Depot, but I’m disappointed that before I can even begin step 1, I have to go buy parts that I’ve already purchased. Total fail. Disappointed. Don’t recommend purchasing this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great goal for price! 3hrs to assemble by myself. Easy to follow instructions. Parts bagged together. Only thing I would recommend and this is for Spaulding not amazon is add a protective film to the backboard. It was a bit scratched.....not entering it in any beauty contests so it remains 5 stars! You will need a drill for the protective framing on the bottom of the goal.... if you don’t own a drill you probably can’t play basketball or put anything together anyway.
customer_reviews.author: georgieb99

customer_reviews.title: Such a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Took over three hours to put together, missing some essential screws as well. Got the thing up and it looks sooo good and is super sturdy but gosh darn it to heck, it was hell trying to put that thing together. Had to add our own spacers to make it work. The price is worth the hoop but it’s definitely not worth the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Instructions manual missing
customer_reviews.text: The hoop arrived in a ripped package. When I opened the box, there was no instructions manual. Had to use the pdf manual online. Nuts and bolts were in different plastic bags, not labeled, not well sealed. Matching nuts to the bolts was a pain. After putting it all together, I could not move the hoop adjuster full circle. It’s a great product once completed, but instructions were lacking and parts were all over, kinda had to figure it out myself.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY M KUNGU

customer_reviews.title: Play ball!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited for my son to get out of the house and play ball. We finally got it assembled after a few hours. It was difficult (in my opinion) but totally worth it. The instructions were clear, it was just required a lot of muscle! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jsmall wood star

customer_reviews.title: Tips on Assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find the directions all that challenging. Directions are never easy to follow and build at the same time and this is no different. Given the feedback that I read on here I asked my wife to read the directions and tell me what to do. This went pretty seamlessly. Towards the end the directions do get vague but not before the heavy lifting is over. All in all we banged out assembly in about 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Layback

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews are correct, it’s not easy to put together. Two people, 3+ hours. Putting the poles together is very difficult, and attaching the poles to the base is a nightmare. I paid entirely too much for this hoop. Once together it is sturdy and looks great, but not worth the headache.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball hoop, seems well built.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well but the crank height adjuster does start to make high pitch sounds when adjusting height, wish there was a lubricant to avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: Babysan

customer_reviews.title: solid goal
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice and well-made basketball goal. Very sturdy. Easy to build. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Great goal but awful to assemble...
customer_reviews.text: Great goal. Awful to put together yourself but I did it, alone, in four hours. Instructions are vague but there is enough information on the reviews to know what to look out for. Attaching the backboard to the swing arms is a beast. Get it right or you get to do it again...
customer_reviews.author: Carlson Brands

customer_reviews.title: so far, awesome hoop
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 4 months now. it's a great hoop. very sturdy(put 200ib of sandbags), height is easily adjustable. We played on it almost everyday since I got it. The only minor issue is when it's wet or raining, the right side of the frame drops rusty water droplet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice hoop!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on portable hoops because I wanted one that wasn't complete junk but also didn't break the bank. Found this one and most the reviews were positive. Putting it together wasn't the nightmare many have said, I think as long as you have 2 people and read the instructions carefully, it's fairly easy to put together honestly. It's a really nice hoop. Sturdy, nice rim, backboard is solid. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball goal
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality basketball goal. There is minimal shake. The components are all durable and it wasn’t to hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Dad, Husband, Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good looking. Kids over the moon excited. 10 yr old helped put it together. Great experience for all.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carter

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Instructions could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing is the base. It's very windy here, and the design of the base allows you to stack lots of gravel/sand, in addition to having and metal anchor and a water reservoir. The instructions are buggy, e.g. different drawing of the same parts are shown with bolts going different directions. The assembly process gets a bit dangerous once the heavy backboard is added.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: Check tank first before assemble
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the whole unit and was leaking . Don’t know if it happened on shipping or manufacture. All I know I got to fix it .
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Well built Basketball Hoop.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about this hoop when I purchased, only because the reviews said it took 4-6 hrs to build. I complete the build by myself in about an 1 1/2 hrs. If I would have had an additional hand I could have completed in about 45 mins I believe. Great hoop and my boys will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Steck

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backboard
customer_reviews.text: Good quality backboard. It took a couple of hours to install, but it was not difficult. I like the indicator on the pole showing how high the rim is set at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled it's a good hoop
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a bit tricky and could've been more detailed. I feel like a kid could've drawn them with a crayon better but 2 plus 2 equals 4 right? Sturdy hoop once assembled, the area to store sand bags is nice. My boy loves it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I also enjoy shooting on it as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it! I also enjoy shooting on it as well. It's like playing on an indoor gym hoop. The neighborhood kids leave their goals to play on ours. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 year old as she starts her basketball career
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: You will need a drill
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid hoop that took my husband and I about 2 1/2 hours to fully assemble. You will need a drill for bottom part of backboard assembly. Overall it’s a nice hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Breaker

customer_reviews.title: First part of long assembly very unclear... ...
customer_reviews.text: First part of long assembly very unclear.... poles Cannot be moved once put together... entire build was not possible after this first mistake.... pissed
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not great for smaller areas because it requires a large footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop so far
customer_reviews.text: Put this together a couple of weeks ago, you definitely need assistance in a couple of places. Total assembly time was about 3-4 hours. The directions were very clear minus one page where the diagram shows about 12 pieces being assembled simultaneously. I ended up with a small mistake there which resulted in the backboard tilting forward. Once that was fixed everything works great, it's very solid. Backboard is a good size, and it's pretty easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Browning

customer_reviews.title: Everything working so far
customer_reviews.text: Everything is working well so far, but I've only owned it for about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaney Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: My son and I love this hoop
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my son for Christmas 2016. I had it professionally assembled through Amazon which saved me a lot of time. We keep it in the garage until the weather got a little warmer. My son and I love this hoop. it still looks good, it is durable and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MEO

customer_reviews.title: But not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Hoop and backboard are not entirely level. But not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to to put together
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to to put together, even by myself. Did need a hand from my 10 year old on a couple of steps. I am very happy with the quality. It is very stable for a portable system. Overall I am very happy with my purchase. Delivery was good, would have been nice to narrow the delivery time down to something less then a 12 hour window though!
customer_reviews.author: Upsand

customer_reviews.title: Beware - base is not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: base cracked after 2 weeks of having it! there is no way a ball hitting this when falling through the net should crack it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

product_meta.title: Spalding Ultimate Hybrid 54" Acrylic Portable Basketball Hoop
product_meta.description: The home court is where legends begin. The Spalding Ultimate Hybrid Portable Basketball Hoop gives you the convenience of a portable system while delivering the high rebound found on the professional court. It has a tempered glass or acrylic backboard equipped with arena-style padding and a heavy-duty breakaway rim built for vicious dunks. The Screw Jack lift system is simple enough for even the youngest players to use, and the Ultimate Hybrid base takes less time to assemble than a traditional base. It calls for a mix of water and sand, which you can load in with no tilting required. A cover on top keeps the ballast out of sight for a clean look.
feature_bullets: Steel board frame with aluminum trim
Ultimate Hybrid base fills with 19 gallons of water and 4 50 pound bags of sand
